bibl.title: Further Horoscopic Ostraca from Medinet Madi.
bibl.note: Edition of O. Medinet Madi Inv. XXIX (post 175 A.D.). Birth note, annotated horoscope, partial horoscope, and birth note; - Inv. 74 (post 165 A.D.). Annotated horoscope, and birth note; - Inv. 251 (post 156 A.D.). Fraction table, procedure text, annotated horoscope, and birth note; - Inv. 312 (post 184 A.D.). Birth note, and annotated horoscope; - Inv. 374 (post 179 A.D.). Annotated horoscope, and birth note; - Inv. 503 (post 187 A.D.). Greek name, annotated horoscope, and date; - Inv. 686 + 511 (post 169 A.D.). Horoscope, two Greek dates, and Greek columnar calculation; - Inv. 943 (post 161 A.D.). Annotated horoscope, birth note, Greek name, and Greek birth note; - Inv. 1005 (post 161 A.D.). Annotated horoscope, birth note, and traces of horoscope; - Inv. 1041 (post 158 A.D.). Birth note, bilingual horoscope with palimpsest birth note, and annoted horoscope; - Inv. 1066 (post 146 A.D.). Two birth notes, annotated horoscope, and procedure text; - Inv. 1335 (post 170 A.D.). Greek name, Greek date, and horoscope.
bibl.seg: Ross Micah, Further Horoscopic Ostraca from Medinet Madi.

Birth note, bilingual horoscope with palimpsest birth note, and annoted horoscope; - Inv. 1066 (post 146 A.D.). Two birth notes, annotated horoscope, and procedure text; - Inv. 1335 (post 170 A.D.). Greek name, Greek date, and horoscope.
